quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
Fall seven times and stand up eight.
The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
It always seems impossible until it’s done.
It does not matter how slowly you go, as long as you do not stop.
Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
The future depends on what you do today.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Failure is not the opposite of success; it’s part of success.
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.
It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
I failed my way to success.
Success is not the absence of failure; it’s the persistence through failure.
The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won’t. It’s whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction, or whether you learn from it.
It’s fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
It’s not the load that breaks you down, it’s the way you carry it.
If you set your goals ridiculously high and it’s a failure, you will fail above everyone else’s success.
Don't be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
Success comes from having dreams that are bigger than your fears.
Dream big and dare to fail.
You have to believe in yourself when no one else does.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.
A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
Action is the foundational key to all success.
To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
The harder I work, the luckier I get.
Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
You can’t have a million-dollar dream with a minimum-wage work ethic.
Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
The man who has confidence in himself gains the confidence of others.
Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered.
Don’t be distracted by criticism. Remember, the only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you.
Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
Great things never come from comfort zones.
Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
Success is a journey, not a destination.
The best revenge is massive success.
The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
A goal is a dream with a deadline.
Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
Success is 99% perspiration and 1% inspiration.
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe.
Some people dream of success, while other people get up every morning and make it happen.
Success is about creating value for others.
People who succeed have momentum. The more they succeed, the more they want to succeed.
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
Success is how high you bounce when you hit the bottom.
Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Success seems to be largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go.
Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
Stop doubting yourself, work hard, and make it happen.
If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you.
Don’t wait for the right opportunity. Create it.
